website_summaries.verdict: Uniden's DECT1580 series of phones will appeal to those looking for a relatively no-frills, inexpensive DECT 6.0 cordless phone.
pros: integrated digital answering machine (on most models)
cons: range isn't quite as large as other models we've tested
process to add customized outgoing answering machine message is unnecessarily convoluted

customer_reviews.title: Uniden DECT 6.0 Digital Cordless Phone with Answering System
customer_reviews.text: Our old phone system was gradually failing. The Uniden system seemed to fit our needs very well and the price was right. It installed easily and after some initial fumbling with the controls (different placement vs our previous Uniden phone system) it is doing everything expected from it. The one issue was the istructions included with the unit. The directions for set up of the answering machine were not complete or were for another Uniden phone. It was necessary to download the correct instructions from the Uniden website before we could correctly set up voice mail and remote access.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Not what Uniden used to be...
customer_reviews.text: Seems that these new ones are not made like Uniden used to make them. We have alreay had issues with one and have set it aside and are currently using the other two. The quality is definately not what it used to be. Get your act together Uniden or you will lose this family for sure.....
customer_reviews.author: wdforever2001

customer_reviews.title: Uniden DECT1580
customer_reviews.text: Products work well and have excellent sound quality. I initialy picked these because they also have a weatherproof unit you can purchase separately for by the pool. Only concern is some features for phone set up have to be accessed from the handheld, this is hard to do without the manual at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uniden
customer_reviews.text: The product shipped ahead of promised time. I already have a Uniden system and found it very reliable. The new handsets are lighter with the sound quality just as good. Speakers on each handset make it idea to have a conversation or a conference call with the ability to work a MACBook at the same time. Most people on the other end cannot distinguish the originating sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Victor N

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: We received these same phones as a wedding gift 4 years ago. It only had 1 handset other then the base set. It got lost in our couch for months which then fried the battery. These phones can take a real beating.Shipped super faxt to our home and looked great couldn't tell they are refurbished. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jojolex

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works well
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an aging unit by the same company. An amazing amount of stuff for what one pays for these phone systems. The battery lasts a long time. The sound is clear. The hand held units feel comfortable in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P. Bud

customer_reviews.title: Uniden Dect 6.0
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful phone, very clear and one can add several extensions. We ordered Orange phone to go with this one for my Husbands workshop. Takes awhile to get it programmed with the main base, but it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Maynor

customer_reviews.title: no problems
customer_reviews.text: Has worked perfectly in the years since we bought it. Nice speaker phone.
customer_reviews.author: L acorn

customer_reviews.title: uniden 6.0 digital cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: I had a5.8 uniden cordless phone pryer to buying this one.I loved that phone! I couldn't purchase new batteries at the store for this phone!!Didn't carry them! So instead of buying new batteries i bought the new uniden 6.0 phone, thinking the phone would be all the same! Wrong! The new 6.0 doesn't have a speed dial and programming phone numbers in it is totally different from my old 5.8!! It would've been nice if it programed the same way my 5.8 did! I'll figure it out some day!! Other than that i like the phone!!
customer_reviews.author: j.d.

customer_reviews.title: cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: These phones were returned. So I guess that tells it all. I didn't like them case closed amen good bye
customer_reviews.author: Wozzie

customer_reviews.title: Uniden Phones
customer_reviews.text: These phones are just what I needed and work very well. It is especially great to have the 2 extra handsets for rooms that do not have phone jacks!
customer_reviews.author: songarden28

customer_reviews.title: My New Phones
customer_reviews.text: I have to say it works outside very well at a far away distance. OH and the answering system works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Novak

customer_reviews.title: Thus far, very, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these Uniden 6.0 phones for about a week and a half and thus I can only rate them within this time frame. I have been very happy with the phones. No problems, very easy to program and no sound problems at all. I cannot state any pro or cons on the battery life - within this short period. If I had to purchase these phones again, I certainly would do so.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: New Uniden Phone
customer_reviews.text: We love our new phone. There were no surprises. It was just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Scraps

customer_reviews.title: udiden DECT 6.0 digital cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: this is our 3rd uniden digital phone.. it is hard to set the different features, particularly to record a new message for the answering machine part. I tried to put in phone numbers and gave up.. to complicated for me...I should have kept my oolder uniden model and just bote new batteries for the 2 handsets...
customer_reviews.author: grandma judy

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone as a replacement of my Uniden phones I had for years. Originally bought AT&T phones to replace it but returned the very next day. Decided I would stick with the faithful Uniden phones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PHONE SYSTEM .....I HAVE HAD A COUPLE MORE OF THESE ALSO
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Uniden 3 handset system & answering machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my daughter in June, then a friend of hers asked for the same thing for Christmas because it was such a great package deal at a great price. The seller was so great!
customer_reviews.author: glassdriller

customer_reviews.title: Uniden cordless phone
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product. It is exactly as described and I would recommend it. Satellite phones work great just as does the base unit.
customer_reviews.author: gofigure

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFACTORY
customer_reviews.text: Excellent features and the DECT 6.0 sound quality is perfect. One can use the speakers on phone and no one knows you are doing this.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick C. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Important parts optional
customer_reviews.text: I've had great results with uniden phones in the past and felt this would be the ideal upgrade. While the phone has several usefull and easy to use features it came as a surprise that to wall mount the base unit you'll need to order the wall adapter from uniden. So add another $10.00 to the price if you need the extra part. The product description leaves this out. Other than that the phone works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Korsu

customer_reviews.title: Uniden DECT 6.0
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is OK. Good Sound reception, Battery life But for it price it is not giving the user , the Value for our Money. Features are pretty basic
customer_reviews.author: Navaneeth

customer_reviews.title: Device is not working proprtly
customer_reviews.text: The device has not been working properly . Most of the time the computer states does it is not recognizing the device. Recommendation to plug it in again. Has worked after 4 to 10 efforts, but sometimes never. I regret this purchase, and will not order anything over the net anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kl

customer_reviews.title: Best so far and Ive been dissappointed by many p.o.c'
customer_reviews.text: I hate garbage phones. They are a rip off. I need them loud, clear, to have caller id, large call logs,50 or so, easy operation, no static, long range, long battery life, durable, stylish, etc, etc. This one is actually worth the money. Ive had mine for at least 8 years. Ive dropped it..... a lot and used it, abused it, etc, etc. I like that it has an answering machine on the hand sets too or rather that I can access it from them. Mine finally broke. It had nothing to do with me. I need another one. To use and use and use. Buy it. Its a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: But whyyyyyy?

customer_reviews.title: Problem on first day
customer_reviews.text: On Day 1 after 7 hours of charging, the base handset went "searching" when only 5 feet from the base. When I push TALK to dial a number, the signal goes awry, breaking up. The secondary handsets do not have this problem. I also found the setup directions incomplete and some parts difficult to understand. I do not recommend purchasing this this phone. I am returning to the store today.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after using the phone for about an year or more. Overall quality of the phone is good. Sound quality through the headset (both internal and speaker phone) is also very good. Although the rechargeable batteries included with the phone were poor. Out of the three headset batteries - - One was unusable in the first month, - Second dissipated over the time of six months - Third one went bad recently
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone system
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this phone for years now. No issues. Great phone quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terra Universalis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Cordless phones do not keep charge... charged all night and still could not use phones the next day. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Scoot

customer_reviews.title: Uniden DECT 6.0 Digital Answering System And Two Extra Handsets
customer_reviews.text: These phones are great and so is the reception I get on them. Uniden is a great product I bought these when my AT&T phone turned out to be faulty. I returned them to the store and ordered one on Amazon. And I am very pleased at the way they pick up outside. If you need a great phone then these are the ones to get.
customer_reviews.author: George T. Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: don't work
customer_reviews.text: First one and the next next handset stopped working. Bought new batteries for them and they still don't work. Now I only have one phone and have to keep running up and down stairs to pick up. Replacing them with a VTech.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Uniden is trash and the customer service is impossible. My set lasted 2 months. I sent it back,at my cost, and have not gotten any response. My daughter got uniden phones for a wedding gift and they're trash as well! There are plenty of other phones out there, do your research.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burch

customer_reviews.title: These are $80 at Staples
customer_reviews.text: Same model number, same number of handsets. Haven't bought one yet, just looking.
customer_reviews.author: Penn Nayme

product_meta.title: Uniden DECT1580-3 DECT 6.0 Cordless Phone with Digital Answering System and Two Extra Handsets
product_meta.description: The DECT1580-3 cordless phone by Uniden is packed with time-saving features that help you better manage your calls. It features a large display screen and orange backlit keys which make it a snap to dial the correct number or access features, even in low-light conditions. The phonebook feature stores up to 70 names with an alphabetical search, unique ringers you can assign to specific calling parties and an option to transfer either a single listing or the entire phonebook. The bilingual menus in both English and Spanish guide you through every step so you can take full advantage of the 10 full hours of talk time per battery charge. Never miss a call with the digital answering system that has up to 14-minutes of recording time. The DECT1580-3 includes two extra handsets and chargers/cradles. About DECT Technology: Advanced DECT 6.0 technology, or Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications, operates on the newly released 1.9 GHz frequency band that was recently allocated to support cordless telephony. Uniden DECT 6.0 incorporates unique "listen before transmit" technology that avoids interference with many household products, such as baby monitors, microwaves and WiFi (which operate on frequencies like 2.4 GHz). As a result, DECT phones offer consumers enhanced voice clarity and crystal clear digital sound quality. DECT 6.0 technology also offers higher security and voice protection, as well as a longer battery and battery standby life than existing 2.4 GHZ or 5.8 GHz phones.
